title: AG DownGel
user_id_label: User ID (from gelbooru.com account, optional for limits):
api_key_label: API Key (from account settings, optional for limits):
no_ai_tooltip: Adds -ai-generated to tags to exclude AI-generated content
file_types_label: File types (select for filtering and sorting):
status_initial:
Enter tags and click 'Download All'. User ID and API Key optional for higher limits. Get at https://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=account&s=options
If 0 posts: add 'hatsune_miku' to 'brazilian_miku' or try 'solo'. Progress indeterminate without total count.
select_file_type_error: Select at least one file type.
no_posts: No posts for the tags. Recommend adding 'hatsune_miku' for 'brazilian_miku' or try popular tags like 'solo female'.
finished: Done! Processed {}/{}, downloaded {}, skipped {} files to folder '{}'.
http_error: HTTP Error {}: {}. Check API limits. See https://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=help&topic=dapi for details.
empty_response: Empty server response (status {}). Possible server overload or invalid tags. Try simple tags like 'solo'.
json_error_auth: Auth error: {}. Recommended User ID and API Key for higher limits. Get at https://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=account&s=options.
json_error: Invalid JSON: {}. Response text: '{}...'. Check tags (no special chars) or gelbooru.com server status.
unexpected_type: Unexpected API response type: {}. Expected list or dict. Text: '{}...'.
